Class ALifeForm

  • java.lang.Object
    • ALifeForm
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Carnivore, Herbivore

    public abstract class ALifeForm
extends java.lang.Object
    Controls all abstract functions shared by life forms. Holds attributes shared by all life forms. Whenever a life form is created, this class constructor is called.
    See Also:
    of Herbivore and Carnivore for how this abstract class is utilised using inheritance.

    • Method Detail

      • getRandDxORDy

        public void getRandDxORDy()
        Method used for changing dx and dy values for a life form, in one of the 8 compass directions.

      • move

        public void move()
        Handles each life forms translation on the simulated 2D map. This occurs each frame and is called in the collision detection methods of a world.
        See Also:
        and collideCarnivores methods in the SimWorld class.

      • expendEnergy

        public void expendEnergy(int value)
        Handles whenever a lifeform uses energy, if its poisoned, it loses twice as much energy after each action
        Parameters:
        value - represents the amount of energy to be lost after an action
